title: BENEDETTA BRACELET, GOLD
description: Our 5-row, pavé lab-grown white sapphire bracelet sits gracefully atop the wrist - but don’t be deceived - the Bendetta bracelet is anything but dainty. Inspired by the gold link sets of the 1930’s, she can be styled alone or loaded up with our Dorsey and Kate rivière bracelets (shown here).
details:
Metal:  18k Gold-Coated Sterling Silver or 18k Gold-Coated Brass
Setting: Pavé set
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Closure: Tongue clasp



6 inches, 5.70 CTW DEW
6.5 inches, 6.10  CTW DEW
7 inches, 6.50  CTW DEW  

What is Lab-Grown?
